title: Love Hotel

verbs: To spend a period of time for travel.
To spend or take a vacation.
To have a strong affection for (someone or something).
Have a great affection or liking for
To have an intense feeling of affection and care towards another person.
Give help or assistance; be of service
To give assistance or aid to.
To feel an affection, emotion or love for.
nouns: A building, esp. one of large size or imposing appearance.
A structure that has a roof and walls and stands more or less permanently in one place
Closed structure with walls and a roof.
Building
A building is a man-made structure with a roof and walls standing more or less permanently in one place.
Structure with a roof and walls, such as a house or factory.
A closed structure with walls and a roof.
A building; a structure; an architectural fabric, especially an imposing one; a large or fine building, public or private.
Man-made structure with a roof and walls standing more or less permanently in one place
A building to which there is free access by the public and which is available for the use of a community.
The industry related with the provision of lodging and usually meals and other services for travelers and other paying guests.
Establishment that provides lodging paid on a short-term basis
A building where travelers can pay for lodging and meals and other services
An establishment that provides accommodation and other services for paying guests; normally larger than a guest house, and often one of a chain.
An establishment that provides accommodation and other services for paying guests; normally larger than a guesthouse, and often one of a chain.
Establishment providing accommodation.
A hotel is an establishment that provides lodging paid on a short-term basis.
Short-stay hotel for sex.
A short-stay hotel operated primarily for sexual activities
A love hotel is a type of short-stay hotel found around the world operated primarily for the purpose of allowing couples privacy for sexual activities.
A short-stay hotel found in Japan and elsewhere, operated primarily for the purpose of allowing couples privacy to have sexual intercourse.
Health care institution
A place where people who are ill or injured are treated and taken care of by doctors and nurses.
A place where sick or injured people are cared for, especially a small hospital; sickhouse.
A health facility where patients receive treatment
A hospital is a health care institution providing patient treatment with specialized staff and equipment.
A place where sick or injured people are cared for, especially a small hospital.
Love is a variety of different feelings, states, and attitudes that ranges from interpersonal affection to pleasure.
An intense feeling of affection and care towards another person.
Emotion based on affection
A strong positive emotion of regard and affection
In the Italian or Latin languages
The form of romantic affection that is considered pure and wholly positive, not just based on feelings of lust.

Love is a word which refers to a variety of different emotional states, feelings or attitudes which range from those of simple personal pleasures or desires to those characterizing interpersonal affection and many forms of profound kindness, compassion, and benevolent concern for the good of others.
?, representing love, the organ, or a card suit
A feeling of love or strong attachment.
Affection is a "disposition or rare state of mind or body" that is often associated with a feeling or type of love.

The heart symbol or "heart shape" is an ideograph used to express the idea of the "heart" in its metaphorical or symbolic sense as the center of emotion, including affection and love, especially romantic love.
Philia, often translated "brotherly love", is one of the four ancient Greek words for love: philia, storge, agape and eros.
A conventional shape or symbol used to represent the heart, love, or emotion: ? or sometimes <3.
Affection, attraction, infatuation, or fondness is a "disposition or rare state of mind or body" that is often associated with a feeling or type of love.
As used by Aristotle in his Nichomachean Ethics
A stylized representation of the muscular organ, used as a symbol for affection, in the shape of two top lobes and a tapering bottom.
A positive feeling of liking
Feeling of love or strong attachment.
A holiday or trip taken by a newly married couple.
A trip taken by a newly married couple during this period.
Trip taken by a newly wed married couple.
A honeymoon is the traditional holiday taken by newlyweds to celebrate their marriage in intimacy and seclusion.
A holiday taken by a newly married couple

description:
A love hotel is a hotel that can be hired by the hour instead of as accommodation for the evening.

Sometimes mistaken for a get well soon emoji due to the similarity in appearance to the hospital. The Microsoft version of this emoji previously displaying a bed with a heart above it.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the love hotel emoji depicts a stylized, modern building with a prominent pink heart symbol adorning its fa√ßade, bathed in soft, ambient lighting. Its rounded edges and smooth, glossy finish lend it a playful yet slightly suggestive appearance, typical of Apple‚Äôs illustrative style. This emoji is commonly used to symbolize romance, relationships, or a discreet getaway, often with a touch of playful innuendo in digital communication.
